head.title: Free Ragtime Program In an Outdoor Series

hedline.hl1: Free Ragtime Program In an Outdoor Series

block.p: LEAD: ''Spring Into Summer,'' a series of free outdoor concerts in the midtown area, is to continue on Tuesday at noon with a performance of ragtime music by Cynthia Sayer and the Crazy Rhythm Jazz Band at 2 Grand Central Towers, 45th Street between Lexington and Third Avenues. The concert is sponsored by the Grand Central Partnership and 2 Grand Central

LEAD: ''Spring Into Summer,'' a series of free outdoor concerts in the midtown area, is to continue on Tuesday at noon with a performance of ragtime music by Cynthia Sayer and the Crazy Rhythm Jazz Band at 2 Grand Central Towers, 45th Street between Lexington and Third Avenues. The concert is sponsored by the Grand Central Partnership and 2 Grand Central

''Spring Into Summer,'' a series of free outdoor concerts in the midtown area, is to continue on Tuesday at noon with a performance of ragtime music by Cynthia Sayer and the Crazy Rhythm Jazz Band at 2 Grand Central Towers, 45th Street between Lexington and Third Avenues. The concert is sponsored by the Grand Central Partnership and 2 Grand Central Towers.

The series is to end on Thursday at noon, with an a cappella rock concert by the group Rockapella in the courtyard of 425 Lexington Avenue, at 43d Street. The performance is sponsored by the Grand Central Partnership and Olympia & York, owners of the building at which the concert will take place. Information: 818-1777.
